channel.title: Error with importing
channel.description:
Hi, I am getting an error when trying to import keyauth. This is the error I am getting
ImportError: cannot import name 'api' from 'keyauth' (C:\Users\maxin\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\lib\site-packages\keyauth\__init__.py)
This is exactly how the example did it so I am not sure what could be going wrong.

item.title: Error with importing
item.dc:creator: Weebzo
item.description:
Godfather227:

(C:\Users\maxin\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\lib\site-packages\keyauth_init_.py)

did you install the lib via “pip”? if so thats not the correct way, since there’s no official pip package of keyauth, download the keyauth.py file from the github and paste it next to ur project root.
Python Example Link

Read full topic

item.title: Error with importing
item.dc:creator: Godfather227
item.description:
Hi, I am getting an error when trying to import keyauth. This is the error I am getting

ImportError: cannot import name ‘api’ from ‘keyauth’ (C:\Users\maxin\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\lib\site-packages\keyauth_init_.py)

This is exactly how the example did it so I am not sure what could be going wrong.

Read full topic
